text: 6:2 Aisaia 49:8; Luk 4:19-21God kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Dughiar kɨ ian kuarkuvigha atɨzim, an otozɨ, kɨ ian dɨmdiam barasi. Dughiar kɨ ian akurvaghasa atɨzir kam, an otozɨ, kɨ ian akura.” Ia oragh! Kɨ ian kuarkuvighamin dughiam datɨrɨghɨn otos. Ezɨ uaghan kɨ ian akurvaghamin dughiam datɨrɨghɨn otos!
